Where did the pod land? Near where trinity and Zeni are? near the 
Cybertron Fire? Near the Predaon base? Near the Allience base?


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  A blast came from the sky. As a shooting object landed in the 
forest. He 
> merged from the pod. A destron. He stood up. A spider. His name 
charon. 
> Kepper of the jailed back on the destron colony alpha 0. He had 
followed 
> someone here. But what he callled himself now. Was remained to be 
seen.
